title: some general bugs of the client
body: hi everyone ! for the past week or so, im having like 30000 different bugs in the client. for the 4 years ive been playing league of legends i had never have so many bug in one period of time. the client crushes randomly, i get bugsplat in-middle a game, i get "dissconnected" and i cannot get to the results screen at the end of every match. is it a known thing? does riot aware of the fact that the client is almost unusable for the last week? please help me fixing that :( my pc is just fine and i can play perfectly fine every other game, and ive tried to reinstall league of legends- didnt work.

replies.body:
It sounds like you have quite a series of issues going on, and it doesn't seem like it's exclusive to just the client.  For example, bugsplatting in the middle of the game can suggest bad game files or drivers failing to render the game.  Our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide should help fix that up, but you'll want to test it in a custom game.

Disconnections usually happens when your network is struggling to reach our services, not something that's caused by the client.  For this, the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should be your best bet.

Go through those, and let me know how everything works out for you.
